REUTERS.UNKNOWN: Y f2176 reute r f BC-SUN-<SUN>-IN-NORTH-DA 04-02 0066

TEXT.TITLE: SUN <SUN> IN NORTH DAKOTA OIL FIND
TEXT.BODY: Sun Co Inc said the O.M. Steel Federal Number One well in Williams County, N.D., flowed 660 barrels of oil and 581,000 cubic feet of natural gas per day through a 13/64 inch choke from depths of 13,188 to 13,204 feet. Sun said it has a 50 pct interest and Comdisco Resources Inc the remainder. An offset well is under consideration, it said. Reuter
